name: Discogs Dark Ultimate
description: Dark redesign for discogs.com - I also created a different style as an "addon": try it! Check out my other "Dark" styles: ₪ Google ₪ Soundcloud ₪ TabletPCReview & NotebookReview Forum ₪ Computerbase ₪ Global dark style ₪ and more...
additional_info: - Changelog: 2021-08-19: Few fixes for the updated website.
